full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 106 of 261 1267 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. And do you recall telling Jeffrey that you were -- 3 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor. 4 THE COURT: Sustained. 5 Q. Did you, at any point, attempt to visit Epstein in New York? 6 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. Did you contact him for the purpose of arranging to visit him in New York? 9 10 A. I felt compelled to contact him. 11 Q. I did not ask you that. I asked you, did you contact him? 12 A. Yes, I did. 13 Q. You initiated email contact with him; correct? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. You initiated contact because you wanted to meet with him in New York? 16 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. And you also asked if you could stay at his place in New York; correct? 19 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. And then you learned that he was not in New York; correct? 22 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, objection. 23 THE COURT: To the question, you learned he was not in New York? 24 25 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, to the series of questions  SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012857
